faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Do I need a card for the trial?
faq.a1: Yes, you need to add a card to start the trial. But nothing is charged until after 15 days. You can cancel at any time.
faq.a2: If you cancel before day 15, nothing is charged. If you cancel after, you keep access until the end of the month.
faq.q3: Does it work for any industry?
faq.a3: Yes, gofidely works for any business that receives customers: restaurants, salons, offices, stores, and more.
faq.q4: How does it connect to Google?
faq.a4: You just need to set up the link to your Google Business listing. gofidely redirects satisfied customers directly to leave a review.
faq.a5: Yes, you can add additional locations for USD 15/month each. Each location has its own metrics and QR codes.
faq.q6: Will I lose my data if I don't pay?
faq.a6: Your data is kept for 30 days after canceling. If you reactivate your account, everything stays as it was.
faq.a7: Yes, you can create individual QR codes per employee and see metrics for each one: average rating, number of reviews, and Google conversion.
